paper.title: Assuring Ownership Rights for Digital Images

author.org: Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Zurich

paper.abstract: The use of digital data has become more and more commercialized. This is especially true for digital images, where proofs of origin and of content integrity are an important issue. This paper describes a problem related to ‘proof of origin’ and proposes a possible solution to it. After a discussion of the solution, possible extensions and related areas of work are addressed.
